1、解压x264
2、到x264目录下
#32位编译
mkdir win32
cd win32
../configure --enable-shared --enable-win32thread --extra-ldflags=-static-libgcc --enable-strip 
make install


#64位编译
mkdir win64
cd win64
../configure --cross-prefix=x86_64-w64-mingw32- --host=x86_64-w64-mingw32 --enable-shared --enable-win32thread --extra-ldflags=-static-libgcc --enable-strip
make install


3、使用VS2013编译，到x264目录下,修改configure 文件中CC="${CC-${cross_prefix}gcc}" 为 CC="${CC-${cross_prefix}cl}"
#32位编译
mkdir win32
cd win32
../configure --host=i686-pc-mingw32 --enable-shared --enable-win32thread --enable-strip --disable-avs --disable-swscale --disable-lavf --disable-ffms --disable-gpac --disable-lsmash
make install


#64位编译
mkdir win64
cd win64
../configure --host=x86_64-pc-mingw64 --enable-shared --enable-win32thread --enable-strip --disable-avs --disable-swscale --disable-lavf --disable-ffms --disable-gpac --disable-lsmash
make install
